strapiEvent.name: Fayetteville Restaurant Week - Feb 19 - 25
strapiEvent.description:
It’s time to celebrate the fantastic food culture that makes Fayetteville such a culinary paradise. With limited-time menu offerings and special giveaways from participating restaurants, you’ll experience new and fresh flavors that can only be found during this week.

Fayetteville has an authentic, diverse culinary scene with everything from fine dining to food truck courts. A mix of local, international, and fusion flavors create a food culture that reflects Fayetteville’s personality. Whether it's an artisan coffee shop, a farm-to-table restaurant, or a long-time local institution, Fayetteville has whatever you're hungry for.

To kick-off Fayetteville Restaurant Week, Experience Fayetteville has partnered with Doomsday Coffee and Roasterie for Bike to Brunch on Sunday, February 19. A complimentary bike valet and priority parking for will be available for cyclists from 10a-2p and Doomsday's popular breakfast menu will be available all day!

Learn more HERE!
